verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> Ye shall make לָכֶ֜ם אֱלִילִ֗ם <WH457> you no idols וּפֶ֤סֶל <WH6459> nor graven image וּמַצֵּבָה֙ <WH4676> a standing image לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תָקִ֣ימוּ <WH6965> neither rear you up לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> of stone מַשְׂכִּ֗ית <WH4906> [any] image לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תִתְּנוּ֙ <WH5414> neither shall ye set up בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <WH776> in your land לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <WH7812> to bow down עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto it for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֣י <WH7676> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <WH8104> Ye shall keep וּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> my sanctuary תִּירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> and reverence אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD ס

אִם־ <WH518> If בְּחֻקֹּתַ֖י <WH2708> in my statutes תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> walk וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> my commandments תִּשְׁמְר֔וּ <WH8104> and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> Then I will give גִשְׁמֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1653> you rain בְּעִתָּ֑ם <WH6256> in due season וְנָתְנָ֤ה <WH5414> shall yield הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the land יְבוּלָ֔הּ <WH2981> her increase וְעֵ֥ץ <WH6086> and the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> shall yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <WH6529> their fruit

וְהִשִּׂ֨יג <WH5381> shall reach לָכֶ֥ם דַּ֙יִשׁ֙ <WH1786> And your threshing אֶת־ <WH853> בָּצִ֔יר <WH1210> unto the vintage וּבָצִ֖יר <WH1210> and the vintage יַשִּׂ֣יג <WH5381> shall reach אֶת־ <WH853> זָ֑רַע <WH2233> unto the sowing time וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> and ye shall eat לַחְמְכֶם֙ <WH3899> your bread לָשֹׂ֔בַע <WH7648> to the full וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <WH3427> and dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> safely בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> in your land

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will give שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> peace בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land וּשְׁכַבְתֶּ֖ם <WH7901> and ye shall lie down וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> no מַחֲרִ֑יד <WH2729> and none shall make [you] afraid וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֞י <WH7673> and I will rid חַיָּ֤ה <WH2416> beasts רָעָה֙ <WH7451> evil מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> neither shall the sword לֹא־ <WH3808> and no תַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> go בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> through your land
וּרְדַפְתֶּ֖ם <WH7291> And ye shall chase אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <WH341> your enemies וְנָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> and they shall fall לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before לֶחָֽרֶב <WH2719> you by the sword

וְרָדְפוּ֨ <WH7291> of you shall chase מִכֶּ֤ם <WH4480> at חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> And five מֵאָ֔ה <WH3967> an hundred וּמֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> and an hundred מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> at רְבָבָ֣ה <WH7233> of you shall put ten thousand יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <WH7291> to flight וְנָפְל֧וּ <WH5307> shall fall אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <WH341> and your enemies לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> you by the sword

וּפָנִ֣יתִי <WH6437> For I will have respect אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> toward וְהִפְרֵיתִ֣י <WH6509> unto you and make you fruitful אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֖י <WH7235> and multiply אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <WH6965> you and establish אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> my covenant אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <WH854> for

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <WH398> And ye shall eat יָשָׁ֖ן <WH3465> the old נוֹשָׁ֑ן <WH3462> old store וְיָשָׁ֕ן <WH3462> supply מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> because חָדָ֖שׁ <WH2319> of the new תּוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <WH3318> and bring forth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will set מִשְׁכָּנִ֖י <WH4908> my tabernacle בְּתוֹכְכֶ֑ם <WH8432> among וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not תִגְעַ֥ל <WH1602> shall not abhor נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> you and my soul אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְהִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֙ <WH1980> And I will walk בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <WH8432> among וְהָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> you and will be לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> your God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> and ye תִּהְיוּ־ <WH1961> and ye shall be לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <WH5971> my people

אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הוֹצֵ֤אתִי <WH3318> which brought you forth אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִֽהְיֹ֥ת <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם עֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> that ye should not be their bondmen וָאֶשְׁבֹּר֙ <WH7665> and I have broken מֹטֹ֣ת <WH4133> the bands עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <WH5923> of your yoke וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> walk אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> קֽוֹמְמִיּֽוּת׃ <WH6968> upright פ

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> But if ye will not hearken לִ֑י וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> unto me and will not do אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> all these commandments הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <WH2708> my statutes תִּמְאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> And if ye shall despise וְאִ֥ם <WH518> and if אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> my judgments תִּגְעַ֣ל <WH1602> abhor נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> or if your soul לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> not עֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> so that ye will not do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> all my commandments לְהַפְרְכֶ֖ם <WH6565> [but] that ye break אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> my covenant

אַף־ <WH637> turn אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> I also will do זֹּ֣את <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֗ם וְהִפְקַדְתִּ֨י <WH6485> this unto you I will even appoint עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <WH5921> over בֶּֽהָלָה֙ <WH928> over you terror אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁחֶ֣פֶת <WH7829> consumption וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקַּדַּ֔חַת <WH6920> and the burning ague מְכַלּ֥וֹת <WH3615> that shall consume עֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> the eyes וּמְדִיבֹ֣ת <WH1727> and cause sorrow נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> of heart וּזְרַעְתֶּ֤ם <WH2232> and ye shall sow לָרִיק֙ <WH7385> in vain זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <WH2233> your seed וַאֲכָלֻ֖הוּ <WH398> shall eat אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH341> for your enemies

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will set פָנַי֙ <WH6440> my face בָּכֶ֔ם וְנִגַּפְתֶּ֖ם <WH5062> against you and ye shall be slain לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <WH341> your enemies וְרָד֤וּ <WH7287> you shall reign בָכֶם֙ שֹֽׂנְאֵיכֶ֔ם <WH8130> they that hate וְנַסְתֶּ֖ם <WH5127> over you and ye shall flee וְאֵין־ <WH369> no רֹדֵ֥ף <WH7291> when none pursueth אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> ס

וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> If עַד־ <WH5704> And if ye will not yet אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> for all this hearken לִ֑י וְיָסַפְתִּי֙ <WH3254> more לְיַסְּרָ֣ה <WH3256> unto me then I will punish אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> you seven times עַל־ <WH5921> for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2403> for your sins

וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֖י <WH7665> And I will break אֶת־ <WH853> גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> the pride עֻזְּכֶ֑ם <WH5797> of your power וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> and I will make אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמֵיכֶם֙ <WH8064> your heaven כַּבַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> as iron וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַרְצְכֶ֖ם <WH776> and your earth כַּנְּחֻשָֽׁה׃ <WH5154> as brass

וְתַ֥ם <WH8552> shall be spent לָרִ֖יק <WH7385> in vain כֹּחֲכֶ֑ם <WH3581> And your strength וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not תִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> shall not yield אַרְצְכֶם֙ <WH776> for your land אֶת־ <WH853> יְבוּלָ֔הּ <WH2981> her increase וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> neither shall the trees הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <WH6529> their fruits

וְאִם־ <WH518> If תֵּֽלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> act עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> against קֶ֔רִי <WH7147> contrary וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֹאב֖וּ <WH14> unto me and will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <WH8085> not hearken לִ֑י וְיָסַפְתִּ֤י <WH3254> more עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> and מַכָּ֔ה <WH4347> plagues שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> seven times כְּחַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2403> upon you according to your sins

וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּ֨י <WH7971> I will also send בָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <WH853> חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> beasts הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> wild וְשִׁכְּלָ֣ה <WH7921> among you which shall rob you of your children אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְהִכְרִ֙יתָה֙ <WH3772> and destroy אֶת־ <WH853> בְּהֶמְתְּכֶ֔ם <WH929> your cattle וְהִמְעִ֖יטָה <WH4591> and make you few in number אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> וְנָשַׁ֖מּוּ <WH8074> shall be desolate דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> and your [high] ways

וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> and if בְּאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not תִוָּסְר֖וּ <WH3256> And if ye will not be reformed לִ֑י וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֥ם <WH1980> by me by these things but will walk עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> against קֶֽרִי׃ <WH7147> contrary

וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <WH1980> Then will I also walk אַף־ <WH637> yet אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I עִמָּכֶ֖ם <WH5973> against בְּקֶ֑רִי <WH7147> contrary וְהִכֵּיתִ֤י <WH5221> unto you and will punish אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> גַּם־ <WH1571> you yet אָ֔נִי <WH589> you שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> seven times עַל־ <WH5921> for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2403> for your sins

וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <WH935> And I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5921> upon חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> a sword נֹקֶ֙מֶת֙ <WH5358> upon you that shall avenge נְקַם־ <WH5359> the quarrel בְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of [my] covenant וְנֶאֱסַפְתֶּ֖ם <WH622> and when ye are gathered together אֶל־ <WH413> within עָרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5892> your cities וְשִׁלַּ֤חְתִּי <WH7971> I will send דֶ֙בֶר֙ <WH1698> the pestilence בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <WH8432> among וְנִתַּתֶּ֖ם <WH5414> you and ye shall be delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> of the enemy

בְּשִׁבְרִ֣י <WH7665> [And] when I have broken לָכֶם֮ מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> the staff לֶחֶם֒ <WH3899> of your bread וְ֠אָפוּ <WH644> shall bake עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten נָשִׁ֤ים <WH802> women לַחְמְכֶם֙ <WH3899> your bread בְּתַנּ֣וּר <WH8574> oven אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> in one וְהֵשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7725> again לַחְמְכֶ֖ם <WH3899> [you] your bread בַּמִּשְׁקָ֑ל <WH4948> by weight וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <WH398> and ye shall eat וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <WH7646> and not be satisfied ס

וְאִ֨ם־ <WH518> if בְּזֹ֔את <WH2063> And if ye will not for all this לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hearken לִ֑י וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֥ם <WH1980> unto me but walk עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> against בְּקֶֽרִי׃ <WH7147> contrary

וְהָלַכְתִּ֥י <WH1980> Then I will walk עִמָּכֶ֖ם <WH5973> against בַּחֲמַת־ <WH2534> unto you also in fury קֶ֑רִי <WH7147> contrary וְיִסַּרְתִּ֤י <WH3256> I will chastise אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> אַף־ <WH637> and I even אָ֔נִי <WH589> you שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> you seven times עַל־ <WH5921> for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶם׃ <WH2403> for your sins

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <WH398> And ye shall eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> the flesh בְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1121> of your sons וּבְשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> and the flesh בְּנֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1323> of your daughters תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> shall ye eat

וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֞י <WH8045> And I will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> בָּמֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1116> your high places וְהִכְרַתִּי֙ <WH3772> and cut down אֶת־ <WH853> חַמָּ֣נֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2553> your images וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> and cast אֶת־ <WH853> פִּגְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6297> your carcases עַל־ <WH5921> on פִּגְרֵ֖י <WH6297> upon the carcases גִּלּוּלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1544> of your idols וְגָעֲלָ֥ה <WH1602> shall abhor נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> and my soul אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> עָֽרֵיכֶם֙ <WH5892> your cities חָרְבָּ֔ה <WH2723> waste וַהֲשִׁמּוֹתִ֖י <WH8074> unto desolation אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדְּשֵׁיכֶ֑ם <WH4720> your sanctuaries וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and I will not אָרִ֔יחַ <WH7306> and I will not smell בְּרֵ֖יחַ <WH7381> the savour נִיחֹֽחֲכֶֽם׃ <WH5207> of your sweet odours

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֥י <WH8074> into desolation אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְשָֽׁמְמ֤וּ <WH8074> therein shall be astonished עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> over אֹֽיְבֵיכֶ֔ם <WH341> and your enemies הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> which dwell בָּֽהּ׃
